metadata.title: CVE-2012-6618 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
The av_probe_input_buffer function in libavformat/utils.c in FFmpeg before 1.0.2, when running with certain -probesize values, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted MP3 file, possibly related to frame size or lack of sufficient "frames to estimate rate."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2012-6618` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavcodec58 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavdevice58 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavfilter7 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavformat-extra - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavformat-extra58 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavformat58 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavutil56 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libpostproc55 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libswresample3 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libswscale5 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.4-6ubuntu5').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
